description:
Sometimes we only want to resize the cpu and ram of the instance, but nova still resizes and convert disk type even if the disk size remains the same with the original, which will cost lots of time.

So we need to avoid resizing disk if the disk size doesn't change.
title: Avoid resizing disk if the disk size doesn't change
